General.Name: Bhakti Multi Artha Pt
General.Description: PT Bhakti Multi Artha Tbk, through its subsidiaries, provides financial solutions in Indonesia. It also provides multifinance and fintech solutions. The company offers group insurance products comprising of national credit life, national personal accident, and national welfare fund protection products. In addition, the company provides group additional insurance and individual additional insurance products. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.
